title: Hextech Crafting Bug?
body: I got from a hextech chest a skin i already own... is that a mess up or is that just possible?

replies.body:
Hextech Crafting loot is completely random, with the only modifier being that it *prioritizes* giving you content you don't already own. The advice that *Warmanreaper* offered about rerolling shards for content you already own is definitely a good choice if you don't need the essence from disenchanting it. 

You can find the whole system rundown in our [Hextech Crafting Guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) Let em know if you have any questions.
possible , Save it and get 2 more skins and u can reroll 3 skin shards into 1 free random skin.
